name: Bounce Up!!!
description:
Can you Bounce Up!!! through this puzzling avoidance game.
Tap left to bounce up left and tap right to bounce up right, avoiding enemies, and collecting coins as you go to bounce to the highest level on the leaderboard.
Use your coins to unlock new characters.
Simple mechanics, addictive gameplay and endless levels.
It's all here in this one of a kind game

Features:
> Simple Controls
> Challenging levels
> Cool Powerups
> Many Unlockable Characters
> Extra Game Modes
>GameCentre leaderboard to compete against the world and your friends.
